ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	
if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
	'番茄:'+fq_last();
	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
	'七猫:'+qm_last();
	} else {
		'{{$.source}}'
		}

</js>

<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'',String(source.bookSourceComment));
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}


let open_argument = source.getVariable();

};

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

// 合并数据
let datas1 = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": fqsjurl,
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },{
        "title": "晴天书架",
        "url": base_url + '/get_user_bookshelf?is_bookshelf=1',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    }];

const datas2 = [{
        "title": "书籍排行榜 ٩( ˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́ )و",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "推荐榜单",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=10',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "完结榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=11',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "热搜榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=12',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "黑马榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=13',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "爆更榜单",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=15',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "巅峰榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&type=0',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "男频精选",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=2',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "女频精选",
        "url":base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=3',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "每周推荐",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&type=1',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }];
const datas = datas1.concat(infoData, groupDatas, datas2);


function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    });
    for (let k1 in data[k]) {
        datas.push({
            "title": '༺༴ '+k1+' ༴༻',
            "url": '',
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "推荐排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        
        datas.push({
            "title": "评分排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        
        datas.push({
            "title": "热门排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
            }
}



JSON.stringify(datas);
</js>
searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}
let media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source',String(source.bookSourceComment));
`${base_url}/search?title={{key}}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let device;
let device_type;
let tab = result.tab;
let sources = result.source;
let title = result.title;
let item_id = result.item_id;

try {
 device = java.androidId();
 device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
 device_type='苹果';
};

if (tab=='小说') {
	if (device_type == '安卓') {
    book.type = 8;} else {
    	book.type = 0;
    	}
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	if (device_type == '安卓') {
    book.type = 32;} else {
    	book.type = 1;
    	}
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		if (device_type == '安卓') {
    book.type = 64;} else {
    	book.type = 2;
    	}
 	 } else if (tab=='短剧') {
 			if (device_type == '安卓') {
    book.type = 8;} else {
    	book.type = 3;
    	}
 		 			} else {
 		 				if (device_type == '安卓') {
    book.type = 8;} else {
    	book.type = 0;
    	}		
 		 				}

let content_url = `${item_id}晴天融合2.1${tab}晴天融合2.1${title}晴天融合2.1${sources}`;
content_url= java.base64Encode(content_url);
content_url= `data:;base64,${content_url},{"type":"qingtian"}`;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
java.log(123);
let book_id = result.book_id;
let sources = result.source;
let tab = result.tab;
let book_tts = result.book_tts;
let tags = result.tags;
let role = result.role;
let last_chapter_title = result.last_chapter_title;
let last_chapter_update_time = result.last_chapter_update_time;
let word_number = result.word_number;
let status = result.status;
let score = result.score;
let media = result.media;
let abstract = result.abstract;
let book_review = result.book_review;
let copyright_info = result.copyright_info;
java.put('book_detail',JSON.stringify(result));
let info;
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';

try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
        } catch (e) {key='';}
if (key != ''){key = '✅️已登录';} else {key = '‼️⛔️您还未登录晴天账号哦，可以点击右上角登录♨️';}
info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}
🪄晴天账号：${key}
🎴当前来源：${sources}
🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment))+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_title}`) {info = info +  `🎯最新章节：${last_chapter_title}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_update_time}`) {info = info +  `⏳更新时间：${last_chapter_update_time}\n`};
if (`${word_number}`) {info = info +  `📝书籍字数：${word_number}\n`};
if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `💥书籍状态：${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};
if (`${copyright_info}`) {info = info +  `📍${copyright_info}`};
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let res =java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('晴天融合2.1');

let item_id = res[0];
let tab = res[1];
let title = res[2];
let sources = res[3];
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';
try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
 } catch (e) {key='';}
        
        
let device,device_type;
try {
    device = java.androidId();
    device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}


let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	 	content_url= `/audio?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&tone_id=${tone_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		 	content_url=	`/pic?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 		} else if (tab=='短剧') {
 		content_url=	`/video?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
	}}catch (e) {}
let content = JSON.parse(data).content;
if (device_type=='安卓' && tab  == '短剧'){
	data = {'content':`【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`}
	data = JSON.stringify(data);
	 if (book.durChapterIndex===chapter.index){
	 //let b64 = java.base64Encode(generateVideoPage(title,content));
	// let dataUrl = `data:text/html;base64,${b64}`;
	// 	java.startBrowser(dataUrl,title);
	 	java.startBrowser(content,title);
	 	java.toast('正在加载视频...');
	}};

data;
</js>
